description: Time to remove the 'crude' in /b/Crude Oil/b/.

Place a /b/Refinery Controller/b/ at the bottom, then /6/stack two-four/6/ /b/Refinery Outputs/b/ ontop. The amount of /b/Outputs/b/ /6/increases the amount/6/ of unique fluids extracted.
/b/Crude Oil/b/ is an example of a refinable liquid. The more Outputs you have, the more oil products you get. (up to four, of course)
